channel.title: Auto banning?
channel.description: ok, how do i auto ban this guy, like every time he logs on, hes ban, i know his ip, but he has anti-ipban...:( heres his ip: adsl-75-47-153-76.dsl.lsan03.sbcglobal.net how would i set a thing in what file that everytime he logs from that ip, hes autoly banned?

item.title: Auto banning?
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

IP bans do not work well! Reason being is everyones IP changes & if you know how you can change it just like breathing.

If you have banned his IP & he is still able to log on it is probably because his IP changed or he changed it himself - You cant do much about this.

Read full topic

he gets on, look at this pic:
